nodes.text: The Rarefied Air Cavalry was Virujansi's most elite starfighter squadron. When Separatist forces attempted to capture Unparala during the Clone Wars, the Rarefied Air Cavalry assisted Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker. Among their number was future Rebel Alliance pilot Garven Dreis, who served as Red Leader during the Battle of Yavin.
